ModMetaData.name: Resource Alert
ModMetaData.author: Deep
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6.2 This mod adds configurable alerts when your stockpile of any resource falls below a threshold you choose.
New in 1.6.2: • Default-map thresholds – apply your alert levels automatically to every new colony. • Multi-map tracking – monitor alerts across all active maps without switching. • Duplicate entry fixes – tracked-resources list no longer shows duplicates. • Restored UI stability – fixed occasional interface glitches.
To set a threshold: LeftShift + Click on a resource icon in the Resource Readout (left side of the screen), then enter your desired amount. To stop tracking a resource, type “0”.
